# delegate

**Instance Property**

A custom delegate object you use to receive notifications about the activation and deactivation of the app extension.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any EXHostViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Responding to activation and deactivation events

- **EXHostViewControllerDelegate**: An interface you use to track the activation and deactivation of an app extension.
